verbose_text: In addition, two REV-ERBalpha molecules binding in close proximity (in this case to two WAWNTAGGTCA motifs arranged as everted repeats 20 bp apart) are also able to recruit NCoR and repress transcription [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: REV-ERBalpha molecules binding in close proximity (in this case to two WAWNTAGGTCA motifs arranged as everted repeats 20 bp apart) are also able to recruit NCoR and repress transcription
